Reviews.Title: Great Kit!
Reviews.Author: Alexey F.
Reviews.Content: Perfect kit for great camera! Everything is as discribed! One minus - additional battery is bad quality. The rest is great!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 9 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-3N Digital Camera & 16-50mm Lens (Black) + <2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<3> Spare NP-FW50 Battery + <4> PD 40.5mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters +
<5> Sunpak 1000XL Compact Tripod + <6> .45x Wide & 2.5x Tele Lens +
<7> PD Mini Sling Backpack + <8> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <9> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-3N Digital Camera with 16-50mm Lens (Black) with 32GB Card + Backpack + Battery + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses + 3 UV/CPL/ND8 Filters Kit
